reviews.review: lots of mods, easyily the best game of the decade.
mad game aye

Das Spiel ist super. Es gibt viele selbst gemachte Mods (Jail, Zombie, Gungame,...) und es gibt noch viele Leute, die dieses Spiel spielen. Es ist nicht wie bei Call of Duty, wo man nur durch die Massen geht und alles tötet. Hier braucht man übung. Ob man jetzt den standard Gamemode mit der Bombe spielt, oder andere von Fans gemachte Mods spielt. Die Source Engine fließt perfekt in das Spiel ein. Das Spiel ist für Strategen perfekt, aber auch für Zocker, die nur rumrennen und alles töten was sie sehen. Man muss aber schon etwas üben, damit man sich in diesem Spiel beweisen kann. Ein Muss, für jeden, der das Spiel nicht kennt!

Любой среднестатистический гражданин планеты Земля практически не в состоянии понять феномен Counter-Strike. Так же, как искушенные в играх спецы не в силах этот феномен внятно объяснить. Ну что такое Counter-Strike, если взглянуть на него непредвзято? Модификация Half-Life, сделанная на старом как мир движке, геймплей которой, в общем-то, мало чем отличается от прочих 3D-экшенов. И вот поди ж ты, без малого шесть лет в эту сетевую войнушку играют миллионные полчища геймеров по всему миру!

What can be said? I would honestly say that the Call of Duty franchise should be sued for creating a direct copy of this game years after its inception, were it not for this game's sheer superiority; said lawsuit would imply that Call of Duty possessed a quality similar to this game. It's phenominal, really, this shooter is incredibly realistic in the fact that tactic, strategy, and skill are all equal members of the combat triangle. Your latency is the best tool you can have, but even then, its a test of skill, and a great one at that. Once you warm up to the system, learn the ways, and pick up your Assault Rifle, as long as your rig can stand it, this game is addicting.
Very competitive, difficult and fun.

If you like a fps with the following I highly recommend:

Gun games! : In the mode of Counter strikes you and other will compete to level through the list of guns set out for you. First one to go through the list will be the victor. Some games have twist were you may go into a knife mood  or you dont respond will somebody on your team kills an opposing player.

Survival (aka Zombies!) : We as games love a zombies survival mode. The supence of trying to survive the onslaught of the endless zombie horde, trying to munch on your internals, make zombies a fun and scary experience. It doesn't end there though. It is fun to have A.I. zombies but what about your own teammates trying to much you! Some of the zombie map start with one player becoming infected, trying to infect others. Keep your enemys close and forget friendship. . .

There is so much more to this game, but I cant explain it all due to case count. I give this game a 5 out of 5 and high recommend to MLG/LEET players

Me being the Tf2 loving fanatic was hesitant to get into the FPS frenzy that is Counter Strike and the fact it didn't have hats to wear.  But what I saw was a beautiful game of no regenerating health, lack of any cover whatsoever, the mechanic of buying weapons, fun mods and maps, etc.  Counter strike is a great experience that shows how good valve is at making online FPS and how much better they are at it in comparison to companies like EA and Activision.  My complaints with the game is the learning curve, the mind boggleing accuracy of the lowest pistol to headshot you can get annoying, how intence the game can get, the lack of hats, and the less newbie friendly system of matchmaking.  But other than those complaints, CSS is a great online shooter expirience that feels smooth as silk with controls and gameplay in comparison to COD or Halo.   But I reccomend this title to anyone bored with TF2(that is insane to think that) or anyone wanting to challenge themselves at a new shooter.
If you dont have this, you are probably a faggot

It's Counter Strike and even though it is an aging product it still manages to capture the same great feeling of a really well tuned multiplayer shooter.  It still suffers from both the good and bad things about the Source engine - the cone of fire system is still inefficient but the Source engine graphics still hold up decently in the wake up more next-gen graphics.  The best part about the game is the perfect pace that no game sense has been able to master.

As Jeremy Clarkson would put it, "that is magnificent!" Except the "that" in question is not a TVR, but a game where you shoot, shoot, shoot, probably miss, die by a headshot, and wait in vain until the round ends. It's quite addicting, fun as hell, and I can't wait for GO. Buy this or you have no soul... or no gentleman's sausage.
